name: AKMS
description: One of the most recognizable assault rifles ever made, the AKM is renowned for its durability even under the worst conditions.  This version features a built in folding metal stock.

name: PM md.63
description: The Pistol Mitraliera model 1963 is a Romanian clone of the Soviet AKM.  This version features a built in wooden forward grip.

name: AK-103
description: The AK-103 assault rifle is a derivative of the AK-74M but chambered for the 7.62x39mm round, similar to the older AKM.
